        <name>Script Operation - u_link_key</name>

        <script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var input = batch[i].input;
     output[i] = 'NETKEY_' + input;
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script>
